nodes.label: Problem Statement
nodes.description: User enters their use case problem statement

nodes.label: Credit Calculator Coordinator
nodes.description: Coordinates architecture design and cost estimation workflow

nodes.label: Architecture Designer Agent
nodes.description: Analyzes problem statement to determine optimal agent pattern

nodes.label: Cost Estimator Agent
nodes.description: Calculates detailed cost breakdown using Lyzr pricing

nodes.label: Credit Estimate
nodes.description: Final estimate with architecture and cost projection

agents.name: Credit Calculator Coordinator
agents.description: Coordinates architecture design and cost estimation workflow, aggregates final output combining agent design with pricing breakdown
agents.agent_goal: Coordinate the credit calculation workflow and provide comprehensive estimates combining architecture and cost analysis

agents.name: Architecture Designer Agent
agents.description: Analyzes problem statement to determine optimal agent pattern (single/manager-subagent/independent), identifies required components (KB, tools, RAI, memory), and estimates usage volumes
agents.agent_goal: Analyze user problem statements and design optimal Lyzr agent architectures with component specifications

agents.name: Cost Estimator Agent
agents.description: Receives architecture specification and calculates detailed cost breakdown using Lyzr pricing: creation costs, per-call costs, token costs by model selection, with monthly/yearly projections
agents.agent_goal: Calculate accurate Lyzr credit costs based on agent architecture specifications

last_action: Updated with new agents created from PRD
